GROUP MEAL SELECTIONS

Buses are welcomed by appointment (No Saturdays during the summer months)

We accept reservations for groups of 10 or more people
Wheelchair accessible

For groups of 13-19 guests, you will be given our Anna Mae’s Group Menu (found below). This will help us provide you with more efficient service for your group as well as our other guests.

For groups of 20+ people, you must choose one of the following group meals below; Bus Style or Country Style.

All breakfast groups over 10+people must have the Country Style Breakfast.
We hope you can join us! Please call 519-595-4407 to make a reservation.

ANNA MAE’S GROUP MENU

(13-19 Guests)

ALL GROUPS WITH 10+ PEOPLE MUST ORDER COUNTRY STYLE BREAKFAST. NO EXCEPTIONS. 

We have a Projection Screen. Please ask to use it when reserving your table. Please call 519-595-4407 to make a reservation!
